productData.longDescription:
• Universal Cup Holder 2 in 1 Device Holder - Adjustable Grip Guaranteed to work with all Smartphones and Tablets, Install in seconds with no tools
  • The base adjusts to fit firmly in all vehicles, cars, SUV, RV, trucks and other cup holders, with easy fingertip access to your device when on the road
  • Flexible neck with a 360-degree multi-angle swivel positioning, ideal for any viewing angle and any road condition
  • Perfect for both driver and passenger - allows for Handsfree visible navigation and access to Play Music, Google Maps, Driving Directions, Traffic Navigation Apps and more
  • 100% Lifetime Satisfaction Guaranteed! If you EVER have any issue with this product we will replace it for free or issue you a full refund!
  • 1 year manufacturer warranty for device and 6 months manufacturer warranty for in-box accessories
